Class ColorTableUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitplane.xt.util.ColorTableUtils

  • public final class ColorTableUtils
extends Object
    Convert Imaris color tables to imglib2.
    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch

    • Method Detail

      • createChannelColorTable

        public static ColorTable8 createChannelColorTable(Imaris.IDataSetPrx dataset,
                                                  int channel)
                                           throws Imaris.Error
        Create an imglib2 ColorTable8 for the given channel of dataset. If the channel has a colortable, translate it. Otherwise, construct a ramp colortable from the base color of the channel.
        Throws:
        Imaris.Error

      • getChannelColor

                                       int channel)
                                throws Imaris.Error

        Throws:
        Imaris.Error

                                                                                                          int channel)
                                                                                                   throws Imaris.Error
        Construct a converters for the specified channel with display range and color set up according to Imaris.
